overview: A short, low-key and very lo-fi video using a camcorder to rephotograph a rendering of a Max/MSP/Jitter patch of of a laptop screen. If the original patch was an experiment in using visual feedback to create semi-deterministic patterns, this rephotographed version is an exploration of the camcorder's auto-focus, how it reacts to flashing lights, how it captures the surface of the screen.
title: 1/22: Light Tests
